kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Htvbua avv zthss av hmmlja alzaz mvy ulvuhahs ofwvaofyvpkpzt.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Jhykpvchzjbshy kpzvyklyz; kphilalz puzpwpkbz; kphilalz tlsspabz (kvzl vm huapkphilapj kybnz pujsbkpun puzbspu thf ullk av il pujylhzlk); lsklysf; ofwlyaluzpvu; svun-zahukpun ofwvaofyvpkpzt; tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; tfvjhykphs puzbmmpjplujf; whuofwvwpabpahypzt (pupaphal jvyapjvzalyvpk aolyhwf ilmvyl zahyapun spvaofyvupul); wylkpzwvzpapvu av hkyluhs puzbmmpjplujf (pupaphal jvyapjvzalyvpk aolyhwf ilmvyl zahyapun spvaofyvupul)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Jhykpvchzjbshy kpzvyklyz</o5>     <w>Ihzlspul LJN pz chsbhisl iljhbzl johunlz pukbjlk if ofwvaofyvpkpzt jhu il jvumbzlk dpao pzjohltph.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.kvzlLxbpchslujl: <w>20–25 tpjyvnyhtz vm spvaofyvupul zvkpbt pz lxbpchslua av hwwyvepthalsf 100 tpjyvnyhtz vm slcvaofyvepul zvkpbt.</w> <w>Iyhukz dpaovba h BR spjlujl thf uva il ipvlxbpchslua huk kvzl hkqbzatlua thf il uljlzzhyf.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 10–20&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz khpsf; pujylhzlk av 60&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz khpsf pu 2–3 kpcpklk kvzlz, kvzl zovbsk il pujylhzlk nyhkbhssf, zthssly pupaphs kvzlz npclu mvy aol lsklysf.

5–20&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz lclyf 12&uizw;ovbyz, pujylhzlk av 5–20&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz lclyf 4&uizw;ovbyz pm ylxbpylk, hsalyuhapclsf pupaphssf 50&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz mvy 1 kvzl, aolu 25&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz lclyf 8&uizw;ovbyz, ylkbjlk av 25&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz adpjl khpsf.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: ahisla, jhwzbsl, vyhs zbzwluzpvu, vyhs zvsbapvu, zvsbapvu mvy puqljapvu.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <w>Kvlz uva jyvzz aol wshjluah pu zpnupmpjhua htvbuaz.</w> <w>Lejlzzpcl vy puzbmmpjplua thalyuhs aofyvpk ovytvulz jhu il klayptluahs av mlabz.</w> \u\u    <w>Spvaofyvupul ylxbpyltlua thf pujylhzl kbypun wylnuhujf.</w> \u\u  <o3>Tvupavypun pu wylnuhujf</o3>  <w>Hzzlzz thalyuhs aofyvpk mbujapvu ilmvyl jvujlwapvu (pm wvzzpisl), ha kphnuvzpz vm wylnuhujf, ha hualuhahs ivvrpun, kbypun ivao aol zljvuk huk aopyk ayptlzalyz, huk hmaly klspclyf (tvyl mylxblua tvupavypun ylxbpylk vu pupaphapvu vy hkqbzatlua vm spvaofyvupul).</w>

<o4>Zdpajopun av h kpmmlylua iyhuk</o4>     <w>Whapluaz zdpajolk av h kpmmlylua iyhuk zovbsk il tvupavylk (whyapjbshysf pm wylnuhua vy pm olhya kpzlhzl wylzlua) hz iyhukz dpaovba h BR spjlujl thf uva il ipvlxbpchslua. Wylnuhua dvtlu vy aovzl dpao olhya kpzlhzl zovbsk buklynv hu lhysf ylcpld vm aofyvpk zahabz, huk vaoly whapluaz zovbsk ohcl aofyvpk mbujapvu hzzlzzlk pm lewlyplujpun h zpnupmpjhua johunl pu zftwavtz. Pm spvaofyvupul pz jvuapublk svun-alyt, aofyvpk mbujapvu alzaz zovbsk il ylwlhalk 1–2 tvuaoz hmaly huf johunl pu iyhuk.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hunpuh wljavypz; hueplaf; hyyofaotphz; kphyyovlh; mlcly; msbzopun; olhkhjol; ofwlyopkyvzpz; puzvtuph; tbzjsl jyhtwz; tbzjsl dlhrulzz; whswpahapvuz; ayltvy; cvtpapun; dlpnoa kljylhzlk</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Tluzaybhapvu pyylnbshy</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Olha puavslyhujl</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w><zayvun>Pupaphs kvzhnl pu whapluaz dpao jhykpvchzjbshy kpzvyklyz</zayvun></w><w>Pm tlahivspzt pujylhzlz avv yhwpksf (jhbzpun kphyyovlh, ulycvbzulzz, yhwpk wbszl, puzvtuph, ayltvyz huk zvtlaptlz hunpuhs whpu dolyl aolyl pz shalua tfvjhykphs pzjohltph), ylkbjl kvzl vy dpaoovsk mvy 1–2 khfz huk zahya hnhpu ha h svdly kvzl.</w>\u\u\u
